_header: Mary for Thine joys five / Teach me the way to right live
Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A popular prayer tag — a single couplet

BLRoy8Fvi.Note: In the Latin text of the Beatrice Legend.

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Lady ffor thy Ioyes fyveWysse me the waye of Rightwys
                    lyffe

A Prayere Off The ffyve Ioyes of owre lady [ ] Inglys and of the ffyve
                    Sorowes (f. 177v)
